ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Special Request: Plane of Mischief
ygData.msgSnippet: Will do bug, but as of yet the entrance hasn t been found.  A guy at work is in FoH and they only have a rough guess of what zone it *may* be in. -=B=- The
ygData.messageBody:
Will do bug, but as of yet the entrance hasn't been found. A guy at work is
in FoH and they only have a rough guess of what zone it *may* be in.

-=B=-
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Talies the Wanderer" <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 12:18 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Special Request: Plane of Mischief


> Can y'all keep an eye out for PoM stuff, and send it my way? That's the
> only thing about Velious that I'm interested in at this point. Big fan of
> Bristlebane that I am, I always thought that Halflings (the big "B"'s
> favoured race) should be able to be Bards ;)
>
> Thanks!
> Talies
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
